member.name: T:Piles_Stiffness_Calibration.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Piles_Stiffness_Calibration.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Piles_Stiffness_Calibration.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Piles_Stiffness_Calibration.My.Resources.Resources.PluginIcon
member.summary: Looks up a localized resource of type System.Drawing.Icon similar to (Icon).

remarks.para: Interface that defines the methods that all the concrete classes of type AudioManager have to implement.
Interface that defines the methods that all the concrete classes of type Controller have to implement.

summary.remarks: Enumeration made from a number Of identification constants For different typologies Of text document from which to extract text and data to be displayed in the UI of the application. Each Constant Is then associated with a specific filepath to the corresponding document. The use of Enum constants allow to hide the filepaths from the user.
Class responsible for running sound effects and calling Model's methods whenever an event gets triggered by any registered command within the UI components of the View.

remarks.para: Static Class responsible to provide utility methods allowing to get important information regarding the files used by the controller.

summary.remarks: Abstract Class used to define common attributes, constructor and methods to be inherited by all concrete classes of type ExceptionHandler.
Interface that defines the methods that all the concrete classes of type ExceptionHandler have to implement.

Concrete class inheriting from the ExceptionHandler class and specialized in creating and displaying a Warning message when ΔK is found to be excessive between two consecutive iterations of the piles stiffnesses calibration.

Static class used to retrieve preset filepaths based on the value of the input Document enumeration. This allows to keep all the filepaths encapsuled within the getPath() method of the present class. These filepaths can be directly accessed via shorter and more intuitive nicknames/short names as per the Document enumeration values, thus making the coding much better readable.
Concrete class inheriting from the ExceptionHandler class and specialized in creating and displaying a Warning message when inputs are found to be missing.

remarks.para: Main class of the Controller Package.
It allows the View to communicate with the Model via the MVC Pattern.
Desing Patterns: - MODEL-VIEW-CONTROLLER
Programming Techniques: - STREAMS

member.name: T:Piles_Stiffness_Calibration.Sound
member.summary: Enumeration made from a number of identification constants for different typologies of sound. Each Constant is then associated with a specific filepath to the corresponding audio file. The use of Enum constants allow to hide the filepaths to the user.

summary.para: Concrete Class implementing the interface AudioManagerInterface and that is responsible for playing the sound effects of the application, when active.

remarks.para: Static class used to retrieve preset filepaths based on the value of the input Sound enumeration. This allows to keep all the filepaths encapsuled within the getPath() method of the present class. These filepaths can be directly accessed via shorter and more intuitive nicknames/short names as per the Sound enumeration values, thus making the coding much better readable.
Design Patterns: - FACADE

member.name: T:Piles_Stiffness_Calibration.InvalidFilePathException
member.summary:
InvalidFilePathException Concrete Class
Exception Concrete Class thrown when filepath provided by the user is not valid.
The class inherits from the Exception class and it gets thrown by the following classes whenever it is found that the provided filepath is not valid.
Programming Techniques: - EXCEPTIONS HANDLING

member.name: T:Piles_Stiffness_Calibration.JSONSerializer`1
member.summary:
JSONSerializer Concrete Class
Generic Type Concrete Class responsible for serializing and deserializing json files.
The class allows to hide the list of calls to Newtonsoft library functions within the two methods and .
This allows to make the code easy to read client side.
The base item type. Must implement IComparable.
Desing Patterns: - FACADE
Programming Techniques: - GENERIC TYPES - SERIALIZATION

member.name: T:Piles_Stiffness_Calibration.MissingInputsException
member.summary:
MissingInputsException Concrete Class
Exception Concrete Class thrown when user inputs are missing.
The class inherits from the Exception class and it gets thrown by the following classes whenever it is found that the required inputs from the user are missing.
Programming Techniques: - EXCEPTIONS HANDLING

member.name: T:Piles_Stiffness_Calibration.PSC_Model
member.summary:
PSC_Model Concrete Class
Concrete class and main class of the Model Package.
The class contains all the main data and methods for the running of the application. The model is updated based on the actions of the user in the View via the MVC Design Pattern while the View is updated based on the changes of the Model via the OBSERVER Design Pattern.
Desing Patterns: - OBSERVER - MODEL-VIEW-CONTROLLER - SINGLETON
Programming Techniques: - STREAMS

member.name: T:Piles_Stiffness_Calibration.Observable
member.summary:
Interface OBSERVABLE
Essential Interface of the Observer Pattern and that, once implemented in the Model, it allows it to notify all the registered observers as soon as a change occurs in its own state.

member.name: T:Piles_Stiffness_Calibration.Observer
member.summary:
Interface OBSERVER
Essential functional interface of the Observer Pattern. Once implemented in the View, it allows it to update itself automatically when whatever change comes about in the Model.

remarks.para: Concrete class implementing the ETABSv1.cPluginContract interface. The method gets run as soon as the user clicks on the icon of the plugin in the ETABS UI. This method is used to instantiate and initialize the Controller () of the application that, in turn, initialize the Model () and the View () as per MVC Pattern.
Concrete class representing the AboutBox of the application, highlighting important information for the user.
The AboutBox window appears after the splashscreen has disappeared and its purpose is to show to the user functionalities and limitations of the tool.
The class implements the Observer functional interface that allows it to be updated with changes occurring in the Model via the Observer Pattern.
The method gets called as soon as the window gets loaded, allowing it to collect the application's assembly information that is stored in the Model
Desing Patterns: - OBSERVER
Enumeration Class listing Names of Running Processes.
Values of the Enumeration allow the class to operate on the window of a specific process running on the screen while hiding from the client the api functions dealing with it.
Enumeration Class listing Window docking options on the screen.
Values of the Enumeration allow the class WindowResizer to place the window in the correct location on the screen hiding from the client the api functions dealing with it.
Static Class returning the string name of the Window corresponding to a specific process.
Given an input Enumeration value, the class returns its corresponding string
Desing Patterns: - FACADE
Concrete class representing the initial splashscreen window of the application.
The class implements the Observer functional interface that allows it to be updated with changes occurring in the Model via the Observer Pattern.
The method gets called as soon as the window gets loaded, allowing it to collect the application's assembly information that is stored in the Model
Desing Patterns: - OBSERVER
Concrete class representing the main UI window of the application.
The class implements the Observer functional interface that allows it to be updated with changes occurring in the Model () via the Observer Pattern.
Desing Patterns: - FACADE
Concrete class and main class of the View Package.

The class contains all the main data and methods for the running the User Interface of the application. The View is updated based on the changes occurring in the Model () via the OBSERVER Design Pattern, while the Model is updated based on the actions taken by the user in the View () via the Controller (MVC Pattern).
Desing Patterns: - OBSERVER - MODEL-VIEW-CONTROLLER
Concrete class responsible for the sizing and arrangement of external application windows.

The class implements functions from the Windows API assembly "user32.dll" to carry out docking and resizing operations on windows belonging to external applications running in parallel to the application.
Desing Patterns: - FACADE
